member.name: T:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType
member.summary: Status effects as enum.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Amnesia
member.summary: The player isn't able to open their inventory or reload a weapon.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Asphyxiated
member.summary: Drains the player's stamina and then health.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Bleeding
member.summary: Damages the player over time.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Blinded
member.summary: Blurs the player's screen.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Burned
member.summary: Increases damage the player receives. Does not apply any standalone damage.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Concussed
member.summary: Blurs the player's screen while rotating.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Corroding
member.summary: Teleports the player to the pocket dimension and drains health until the player escapes or is killed.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Deafened
member.summary: Deafens the player.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Decontaminating
member.summary: Removes 10% of the player's health per second.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Disabled
member.summary: Slows down the player's movement.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Ensnared
member.summary: Prevents the player from moving.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Exhausted
member.summary: Halves the player's maximum stamina and stamina regeneration rate.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Flashed
member.summary: Flashes the player.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Hemorrhage
member.summary: Drains the player's health while sprinting.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Invigorated
member.summary: Reduces the player's FOV, gives infinite stamina and gives the effect of underwater sound.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.BodyshotReduction
member.summary: Reduces damage taken by body shots.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Poisoned
member.summary: Damages the player every 5 seconds, starting low and increasing over time.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Scp207
member.summary: Increases the speed of the player while also draining health.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Invisible
member.summary: Makes the player invisible.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.SinkHole
member.summary: Slows down the player's movement with the SCP-106 sinkhole effect.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Visuals939
member.summary: Gives the player the SCP-939 sound vision.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.DamageReduction
member.summary: Reduces overall damage taken.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.MovementBoost
member.summary: Increases movement speed.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.RainbowTaste
member.summary: Severely reduces damage taken.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.SeveredHands
member.summary: Drops the player's current item and deals damage while effect is active.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Stained
member.summary: Prevents the player from sprinting and reduces movement speed by 20%.

member.name: F:Exiled.API.Enums.EffectType.Visual173Blink
member.summary: Causes the player to blink.

member.summary: Causes the player to slowly regenerate health.

member.name: M:Exiled.API.Features.Items.Item.Create(ItemType,Exiled.API.Features.Player)
member.summary:
Creates a new with the proper inherited subclass.
Based on the , the returned can be casted into a subclass to gain more control over the object.
- Usable items (Adrenaline, Medkit, Painkillers, SCP-207, SCP-268, and SCP-500) should be casted to the class.
- All valid ammo should be casted to the class.
- All valid firearms (not including the Micro HID) should be casted to the class.
- All valid keycards should be casted to the class.
- All valid armor should be casted to the class.
- Explosive grenades and SCP-018 should be casted to the class.
- Flash grenades should be casted to the class.
- SCP-2176 can be casted to the class.
The following have their own respective classes:
- Flashlights can be casted to .
- Radios can be casted to .
- The Micro HID can be casted to .
- SCP-244 A and B variants can be casted to .
- SCP-330 can be casted to .
Items that are not listed above do not have a subclass, and can only use the base class.
member.param: The of the item to create.
The who owns the item by default.
member.returns: The created. This can be cast as a subclass.

member.name: P:Exiled.API.Features.Player.SessionVariables
member.summary:
Gets the dictionary of the player's session variables.
Session variables can be used to save temporary data on players. Data is stored in a . The key of the data is always a , whereas the value can be any . The data stored in a player's session variables can be accessed by different assemblies; it is recommended to uniquely identify stored data so that it does not conflict with other plugins that may also be using the same name. Data saved with session variables is not being saved on player disconnect. If the data must be saved after the player's disconnects, a database must be used instead.

member.name: P:Exiled.API.Features.Player.Role
member.summary:
Gets or sets a that is unique to this player and this class. This allows modification of various aspects related to the role solely.
The type of the Role is different based on the of the player, and casting should be used to modify the role.
= .
= .
= .
If not listed above, the type of Role will be .
If the role object is stored, it may become invalid if the player changes roles. Thus, the property can be checked. If this property is , the role should be discarded and this property should be used again to get the new Role. This role is automatically cached until it changes, and it is recommended to use this propertly directly rather than storing the property yourself.
Roles and RoleTypes can be compared directly. Player.Role == RoleType.Scp079 is valid and will return if the player is SCP-079. To set the player's role, see .

member.name: M:Exiled.API.Features.Round.Restart(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,ServerStatic.NextRoundAction)
member.summary: Restarts the round with custom settings.
member.param: Indicates whether or not it'll be a fast restart. If it's a fast restart, then players won't be reconnected from the server; otherwise, they will.
Overrides a value of . Makes sense if someone used a command to set another action.

The .
- does nothing, just restarts the round silently. - restarts the server, reconnects all players. - shutdowns the server, also disconnects all players.
